description: Unit test file for the Team class in the agno project, testing team member management and messaging functionalities.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with a name, model, role, and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with methods for messaging and member management.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for financial data retrieval via Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: team
methods.description: Fixture that sets up a team with web and finance agents for testing.

methods.name: test_team_system_message_content
methods.description: Tests the content of the system message generated for team members.

methods.name: test_transfer_to_wrong_member
methods.description: Tests handling of transfer requests to a non-existent team member.

methods.name: test_forward_to_wrong_member
methods.description: Tests forwarding messages to a non-existent team member.

methods.name: test_get_member_id
methods.description: Tests the internal method for retrieving member IDs based on various conditions.
